data.title: Pride Movie Screening: Stonewall Uprising
data.meta_description: Screening of the PBS Documentary “Stonewall Uprising” Clint Harris, chair of Democrats Abroad Costa Banderas Chapter, invites you to celebrate Gay Pride with a special movie screening. Join them on Tuesday, May 21st, for a showing of the acclaimed PBS documentary “Stonewall Uprising.” This powerful film explores the pivotal 1969 riots that ignited the modern LGBTQ+ rights movement.…
data.text:
Screening of the PBS Documentary “Stonewall Uprising”

Clint Harris, chair of Democrats Abroad Costa Banderas Chapter, invites you to celebrate Gay Pride with a special movie screening.

Join them on Tuesday, May 21st, for a showing of the acclaimed PBS documentary “Stonewall Uprising.” This powerful film explores the pivotal 1969 riots that ignited the modern LGBTQ+ rights movement.

Event Details:

Date: Tuesday, May 21st

Time: 2:00 PM – 3:45 PM

Location: Nacho Daddy (Upstairs) – Basilio Badillo 287, Zona Romántica, Emiliano Zapata, 48380 Puerto Vallarta

Suggested Donation: $100 MXN (at the door) – Donations will directly support event tech costs.

Celebrate History, Support Democracy

This movie night offers a chance to commemorate a pivotal moment in LGBTQ+ history and engage with your local Democratic community.

Democrats Abroad: Expanding Voter Access
